question: Devbhoomi dialogue a campaingn to connect with youngsters was started in which state?
explanation: Uttarakhand Chief Minister Trivendra Singh Rawat launched a campaign called "Devbhoomi dialogue", calling upon youth to look for self-employment opportunities in their chosen fields. Seeking valuable suggestions from Youth, Mr. Rawat stated that a search for self-employment opportunities can to help check the perennial problem of migration from the remote hill areas. He added that, suggestions made by the youth under this programme will be included in the policies to be framed by Uttarakhand State Government in future. Uttarakhand State Government had successfully conducted a similar feedback oriented programme called 'Apki Rai, Apka Budget' to seek suggestions from public before introducing State's annual budget in March 2018.
